CustomObject.description: Custom metadata type to configure the WAV_OrgSnapshot_SCH schedulable apex class, used to initiate/update Analytics datasets with various Org data. - For picklistValues, the label should contain the picklist field in "ObjectApiName.FieldApiName" format - For objectCount, the label should contain the object in "ObjectApiName" format - For orgLimit, the label should contain the limit name
CustomObject.label: WAV_Snapshot_CFG
